div.p: Asclepiades greets his dearest Demosthenes. Dius also called ....us, who brings you this letter, is a friend of mine. So help (?) him in order that (?) he may buy ---. Write me back through him on any other matter you need in Ptolemais. And buy me a pair of plain cushions and receive the price from him ---. Translation: P. van Minnen, P.Leid.Inst. 1 31
